title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: run Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other models locally with a single CLI or Docker command.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama’s REST API, published on npm as ‘ollama’.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama, available on PyPI as ‘ollama’.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package (langchain-ollama on PyPI) to use Ollama models as LLMs or embedders.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama backends; runs in Docker or as a pip package ‘ollama-webui’.

title: oll4ma/ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that forwards user prompts to a local Ollama instance.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Lightweight retrieval-augmented generation demo using Ollama embeddings and llama-index.

title: ollama-cli-chat
summary: Interactive terminal chat wrapper written in Go that remembers conversation history.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: Community n8n node to call Ollama models inside no-code workflows.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Visual Studio Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with optional GPU nodes and model pre-loading.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client SDK for Ollama, published to Maven Central.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-cog
summary: Cog container wrapping Ollama for easy deployment on Replicate.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Minimal Slack bot using Bolt-js that answers questions via Ollama.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to summarize notes or generate text using local Ollama models.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration package to use Ollama models as generators or embedders.

title: ollama-dagger-module
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a service for CI pipelines.

title: ollama-rag-chatbot
summary: Streamlit chatbot template combining Ollama LLM and Chroma vector store for PDF Q&A.

title: ollama-mcp
summary: Model Context Protocol server exposing Ollama functions to Claude and other MCP consumers.
